summary: Feature request to implement environment configuration for the TypeScript SDK, following the pattern defined in the external client configuration proposal for all SDKs.
userImpact: Users lack a standardized way to configure the TypeScript SDK through environment variables, making setup and deployment configuration more difficult.
proposedFix: Implement environment configuration following the pattern defined in the external client configuration proposal (temporalio/proposals).
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented following the cross-SDK external client configuration proposal guidelines.
